about_the_game:
This DLC includes a collection of CG artworks and a Character Emoji Pack for "Towards Future." Since the game is free to play, if you enjoy this game and would like to support the developer, please feel free to purchase this art DLC! :->

Developer's Message:
Thanks to the support from both Eternal Dream Games and the °Know Team! The English and Japanese versions of "Towards Future" are now available on Steam, and I'm super excited! Players from different countries can finally enjoy this story~ Hope you guys love it!
And if you find yourself enjoying the game, please consider purchasing the DLC~! Your support would mean the world to us~! >o
detailed_description:
Where to Find

Once you have "Towards Future" in your Steam game library, this DLC will automatically download after your purchase.
Please right-click on "Towards Future" in your library, go to Manage > Browse local files, and you will find the DLC folder!
